summary: compared to vanilla mjoll this is quite a glam makeover
descriptionHtml:
this is pretty lore-unfriendly face tweaking for Mjoll the Lioness. surprisingly her facial structure was largely unchanged, i usually have to move everything. 
just think of this as Mjoll before she got slapped by Dwemer centurion. imo, vanilla mjoll is lore unfriendly for someone who got beat down by centurion. she should be missing a face or something.

If you like this, please endorse and check out some of my other NPC face change

If someone could upload a picture this Mjoll in their game, since i do not have her quest completed she will not stay still for pic

------------------

INSTALL
Drop .bsa and .esp into Data folder
-Put at bottom of load list
-Will conflict with mods that also change Mjoll\'s face

------------------

Required mods
ApachiiSkyHair 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Recommended mods

You will need these also to replicate my uploaded image:

Coverwomen by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563
Covereyes by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869
DIMONIZED UNP female body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

------------------
Creds to above for their awesome textures and meshes
author: YellowPaint
